fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Revenge: When you die, privately deal 2 HP of unblockable damage to a player of your choice at the end of the phase. Must be chosen by the end of the phase following your death.
- Mutually Exclusive: You will only spawn if the King is not Chaos-aligned.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Underground King: Visit the Underground Lair this Night phase. [2 uses, 4 CD]
- Bribe: Give a Chaos member a priority point for the following Night phase. [2 uses, Post-Mortem]
- Perfect Trace: Choose an Order non-Unique, non-recharging ability and give __one__ use of it to a Chaos member of your choice. [X uses, 1 CD, Post-Mortem]. *X = (# of Chaos members - 1)*
